head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SULLIVAN, MARY CECELIA GLEASON

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SULLIVAN, MARY CECELIA GLEASON

block.p: SULLIVAN-Mary Cecelia Gleason, died October 26. Beloved wife of the late Joseph J. Sullivan. Devoted mother of Joseph J. Sullivan Jr. and Cecelia Sullivan Murray. Cherished grandmother of Joseph J. III, Sean P. & Shane P. Sullivan, Suzanne Sullivan Fraser, Megan and John F. Murray III, Michele Murray Sloan & Meredith Murray Landino. Loving great-grandmother of Aidan Fraser, Emily Cecelia, John Prentice, Peter and the late Robert Sloan III. Calling hours Sunday, 2-5 PM, Fred H. McGrath & Son Funeral Home, Bronxville. Mass of Christian Burial St. Joseph's Church, Bronxville, is at 10 AM, Monday, October 30th.
